title: Things You Want to Remember
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Heyaa! Huh, is it just you two, Ayumu, Settsu?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ah, Ai-chan, perfect timing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Ai-san, look at these!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hm? What are those~? ....Pictures of everyone?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>That’s right. I was walking with that person in the courtyard the other day during lunch break. Then we saw Karin-san, Emma-san, and Kanata-san napping peacefully, so I couldn’t help but take this picture.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>This picture was from when Shizuku-san and the others took their revenge on Kasumi-san by tying her hair into a topknot for a prank Kasumi-san did. Fufu, Kasumi-san seems really embarrassed here, but this hairstyle was cute too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Fufu, each of these pictures is just great, huh. They have this “youth!” feeling to them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah. I’ve been looking through other pictures we took so far with Setsuna-chan, and we’ve been talking about making an album with them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai agrees! Ai wants to leave a record of our youth~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>It’s decided then! So, let’s begin choosing the pictures right away.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ah, wait, hold on! Since we decided to do it, let’s also take a picture together!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>You mean, right now? There’s nothing special going on, but is that okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>It’s probably fine. You always want to remember moments where you had fun, after all. Fufu, let’s take one with the 3 of us! I want to show this picture of us to everyone as well, Setsuna-chan, Ai-chan♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
